resources.string:
MineClicker - This is a game that will help you pass the time. You can play in a train, plane, even lying on the couch. I think you can play it wherever you want. I don't even know what to write hereâ€¦ Come up with a cool description and funny jokes.

 Developers:
 Vladislav Kostyuk- Code. For communicating: kostiukvladyslav@gmail.com
 Yurii Shvets - Design. For communicating: nerkinfeed@gmail.com

 The basis was a flash game called "GrindCraft". Special thanks JeTSpice

 The game used such resource packs as:
 PureBDcraft: bdcraft.net Triton Resource Pack: ringoster.wixsite.com/triton
 Smooth Operator
 Faithful
 SheWolf Realism

 All sounds and music are taken from the free library: freesound.org

 "Industrious Ferret" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
 "Fireflies and Stardust" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
 Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

 DENIAL OF RESPONSIBILITY: This is NOT a Minecraft Pocket Edition. This application is not linked in any way with Mojang AB. In accordance with
 http://account.mojang.com/documents/brand_guidelines
 https://account.mojang.com/terms

 All files provided for download in this application are provided under the terms of a free distribution license. If you believe that we have violated your intellectual property rights or any other agreements, write to us by e-mail nerkindroidgames@gmail.com, we will try to eliminate all violations immediately.

string-array.name: splashs
string-array.item: Jump up\n jump up\n and get down!
